content: Well (with head hung low)…I was reading up on Twain’s book of the gilded age and came across Nast’s name. Technically didn’t Google it but still sort of stumbled over it and got curious. On a positive note, to learn even more about Nast I downloaded Twain’s anecdotes and quotes that mentions the artist.I’m hoping for at least 2.5 out of 5 stars for my effort.
